title: How to Master Patapon for the PSP

steps.headline: Wait 4 beats.
steps.description: Listen to the "tick-tick-tick-tick" before drumming. Experienced players can wait just 1-3 beats, but until you get the basic rhythm down, don't try this.

steps.headline: Tap your foot.
steps.description: If standing, tap your left thumb on the screen.

steps.headline: Always start with pata-pata-pata-pon unless there are Zigotons right in front of you.
Use chaka-chaka-pata-pon only when you know you will need Fever later on or when there are loads of Zigotons.
steps.description: Don't use during a boss unless it will throw flames at you.

steps.headline: Use don-dodon-dodon only in Fever.
steps.description: If not, you will lose your combo.

steps.headline: That's it!
steps.description: You will be on your way to winning!

text: Wait 4 beats. Listen to the "tick-tick-tick-tick" before drumming. Experienced players can wait just 1-3 beats, but until you get the basic rhythm down, don't try this. Tap your foot. If standing, tap your left thumb on the screen. Always start with pata-pata-pata-pon unless there are Zigotons right in front of you. Then do pon-pon-pata-pon. Use chaka-chaka-pata-pon only when you know you will need Fever later on or when there are loads of Zigotons. Don't use during a boss unless it will throw flames at you. Use don-dodon-dodon only in Fever. If not, you will lose your combo. That's it! You will be on your way to winning!
